name: Burnin' Rubber Multiplayer
description:
What is it?

Dominate your friends in this long-awaited multiplayer car combat arena game. Hunt down enemies and stun them with your driving and shooting skills. Lots of awesome cars to unlocks and explosive weapons to try out. Features the brand new U-turn move to surprise your enemies!

There's always someone to play with because this game connects with the browser version of the game too!

Let us know what you think and help us develop the game further on Discord https://discord.gg/cgQRb2j

Features
  • 5 Remastered deathmatch maps!
  • 40 Cars, all classics from the BR franchise!
  • All primary, secondary and special weapons you know and love!
  • Complete challenges to earn in-game cash and BR tokens!
  • Full controller support!
  • Create your own private games!*
  • $ 100,000 in game cash to buy new cars!*
  • 200 BR Tokens to unlock some exclusive cars right away!* 
  • No advertisements anywhere!*
  • Stable high res, high frame-rate performance!*
  • Uncompressed art and audio assets!*

* These features are exclusive to this downloadable version of the game.

System requirements

Burnin' Rubbber Multiplayer should run properly even on older machines (5+ years old).  High quality visual features can be disabled in the Settings menu if you are experiencing performance problems. You can toggle fullscreen by Alt + Enter ingame.

Please mail for help or any issues to support@xformgames.com

***

Talk about the game and development on Discord https://discord.gg/cgQRb2j
You can get this game for FREE by becoming a Hero through our patreon! https://www.patreon.com/xformgames
You can also follow us at work on twitter @XformGameDev Like us on Facebook! http://www.facebook.com/Xform
